title: Rito gifting good boys and girls.
body:
Hey guys,
I have just received my gift from riot and I would like to say thanks. I have been playing for two years now and the game has been fantastic as it has developed. I didn't receive no Spirit Guard Udyr xD but I did receive The Mighty Jax. I would like to thank riot for this amazing skin. Feel Free to post what you got for your mystery gift here.
Jomoko2012 :D

replies.body: Yeah I know I love the Might Jax! Thanks Riot :D

The Mighty Jax is a legacy skin, and may or may not return to the shop, spirit guard udyr while its an awesome skin can be bought any old time
so you got a good deal on that in my opinion haha
i got Infernal Alistar and I'm pretty pleased with that :D
I refuse to believe anyone on this server isn't abusive.
Mighty Jax is way better than spirit guard udyr, congrats man.
Damn that's not good :/ I hope you can login soon and see your skin. :)

And there's Mac users.

"can't even login..."
